title: Deep Delver
content:
Deep Delver Uncommon 1~8 Damage 1d8 Piercing Deep Delver: Inflicts Shattered on hit. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Countless hands have smoothened the half and sharpened the blade. This is an ancestral weapon - perhaps dating back to the ancient digs that sundered thhe duergar from their dwarf-kin. War Pick 0.9 100

Deep Delver: Inflicts Shattered on hit.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
